item.description:
Well, it ended up being in central Worcester this time.  Give yourself a little extra time for parking, it can be limited.  RSVPs will close next Wednesday so I can give them a final count.

As always, Please only RSVP YES if you are POSITIVE you can attend. We understand dropouts are unavoidable sometimes, but your YES could keep someone who could go from knowing that it's a possibility for them to attend. Thanks!

Again, and for newbies, most restaurants will not split the check for large parties so please bring cash! Any changes will be posted here.

-Chris
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for a large party under "Chris"
item.why: Getting together with people is just plain fun and Atheists gathering on Good Friday? Even better.
item.name: Atheists Night Out
